channel.title: TTRPG Hacks and Getting Games to the Table
channel.description: On the new Gauntlet Podcast I present the audio from a recent seminar on TTRPG hacks: kinds, how to approach them, best practices, advice for creating new games and more. The talk is followed by a Q&A from the audience. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/ttrpg-hacks-and-getting-games-to-the-table

item.title: TTRPG Hacks and Getting Games to the Table
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the new Gauntlet Podcast I present the audio from a recent seminar on TTRPG hacks: kinds, how to approach them, best practices, advice for creating new games and more. The talk is followed by a Q&A from the audience.

THE GAUNTLET

TTRPG Hacks and Getting Games to the Table

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss
